channel.title: Administrative Burden on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Administrative Burden on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 44: The Paperwork of Being Alive
item.description: Maria works two jobs. Days at a fulfillment center, evenings cleaning offices. She has two kids, a car that's twelve years old, and exactly enough income to almost make it work.

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 45: The Burden of Rights
item.description:
They gave you privacy. Now you manage the passwords.

They gave you autonomy. Now you make the decisions you never wanted to make.

They gave you the right to expert opinion. Now you figure out how to afford it.
